Comment: *"Every day we are in conversation with China, along with those other 99, 100 countries that have come to the table," Rollins said on CNN's "State of the Union."*  I'm starting to think we need to ask the question, "When you say, *'...every day we are in conversation with China...'* do you mean, we're talking to china about tariffs or we're begging china to pick up the phone and talk to us?
